ListElement: that the child[ren] [has] [have] a history of absconding and [is] [are] likely to abscond from any other accommodation and if the child[ren] abscond [he] [she] [they] [is] [are] likely to suffer significant harm.
that if the child[ren] [is] [are] kept in any other accommodation, [the child] [they] [is] [are] likely to injure [himself] [herself] [themselves] or other people.
(In the case of a child under the age of 13) The approval of the Secretary of State to the placement of the child[ren] in secure accommodation has been granted and is attached.
